name: ParmaPals
description:
Welcome to an endless runner/flying game where you play as a parma violet travelling down a digestive tract and saving ya mates.

You can shoot food stuffs to make them disappear and avoid the red anti acids while collecting your parma pals along the way.

I'll think of better stuff here soon I promise, believe in me like I believe in barn owls wishing they could second mortgage their barns.
